scripts.say: Yukikaze, Taihou, and of course, Suruga, you've all done me proud. Even the Commander has praised your outstanding performance during this exercise.
You had me worried at the end there! Thank goodness we only use blanks for exercises!
And you got within such close range of my Commander... I demand you give me that privilege the next time, Suruga!
Ahahahah! It's fantastic to see you in such high spirits immediately after an exercise! I say we have Aoba write a special news report on your exploits today.
A... a whole report?!
Sorry, but I would MUCH prefer not to!
(Looking back, I really wasn't expecting all this to happen...)
And so, as per Mikasa's advice, I shall serve as the commander of the Sakura Fleet since I have not become a full-fledged member of this naval base yet.
(I only agreed to it because I was expecting that position to be purely honorary and not require me to make any decisions!)
Heheh! We don't need any cheap tricks for that! This is nothing that cannot be solved with Yukikaze the Great's extraordinary luck!
(Ugh... I really can't deal with these empty-headed optimists who can't seem to take anything seriously...)
(But, you know, we're still in this together, which means I can't just throw her under the bus! And that in turn means I have to work even harder!)
And, while I wouldn't mind suffering a crushing defeat at my Commander's hands, that would reflect poorly on the Sakura Empire's reputation...
(You don't say! And how in the world could I have known the Commander's fleet would be so powerful?!)
(Of course they'd mop the floor with us if I didn't pull out some clever trick! I had no choice, you know? Do you really think I like standing out like this?)
(Oh, and the Commander knows all of you well enough to see right through your plans, right? But as an outsider, things were different for me.)
You had me worried at the end there! Thank goodness we only use blanks for exercises!
And you got within such close range of my Commander... I demand you give me that privilege the next time, Suruga!
(An outsider... That's what I am... But nobody here treated me like one...)

sequence: <size=51>What if... this is where I belong...?</size>

scripts.say: Correct. There is no gap between ships that have a service history and those that lack it.
So what do you say, Suruga? Won't you become an official member of our fleet?
Considering your exercise performance, you might get accustomed to life here even quicker than those girls from the development dock. Hahaha!
You have plenty of time. Ponder it for a while and do what your heart says is right.
(She's right. This might be where I, and that speedy, annoying little destroyer belong...)
Let us meet again soon...
